tag_list: web-design, website-design, website-development, application-development, search-engine-marketing, seo, hosting
overview:
As Director of Sales for ParableSoft, Luis has the responsibility of managing the company’s overall sales strategy. With over 20 years of sales and marketing experience, Luis has been an integral part of the company’s growth and brings an extensive amount of knowledge and experience. Luis has served as President of American CompuSystems and is currently on the board of the American marketing Association of Tampa Bay. Luis will continue to leverage his vast knowledge of technology, sales and marketing to continue to deliver ROI driven solutions for our clients.

Personally Luis is married and has two young boys. He enjoys playing Golf, Tennis and spending time with his family.
